values:
This has certainly been one of the more pleasent holidays I've had.  Honestly, I was never a large fan of the expensive and elaborate balls that we always had that required me to wear some sort of stuffy gown and pretend as though I wanted to carry conversation with near complete strangers - if you can imagine so.  It really has been lovely just being able to lay low in my flat with Severus's company and the occasional visit from Sirius.

I hope everyone is enjoying their holidays!

<lj-cut text="Private to Self">
I don't want to go back to Hogwarts.  I haven't dreaded returning to school this much ever.  Normally at this time I would be counting down the days, but this year I want to stay in London.  However, I do need to finish Hogwarts, even if Sirius is right about me not needing to get a job.

I only hope that once we are all back at the castle things don't become dramatic again.  Although things have undoubtably managed to be dramatic outside the castle..  We'll see.

<lj-cut text="Private to Regulus">
Regulus,

I'm sorry it's taken me so long to do this, but we should talk soon.  Please let me know when you're free, all right?

- Andie

<lj-cut text="Private to Severus Snape">

Severus,

I've had quite a bit of homework lately, but I'd like to see you some time soon.  When are you free?

- Andie</lj-cut>

<lj-cut text="Private to Sirius Black">

Sirius,

I'd like to see you soon.  Let me know when you are free so we can get together?

- Your favourite cousin

<lj-cut text="Plain envelope with Andromeda's small script proclaiming his name in the center">

Sirius,

I'm speechless.  I'm not entirely sure as to why I am as I know you too well and should've expected so much, but really.  Thank you so much, Sirius.  I appreciate everything you've done and once I'm settled I'll treat you and Regulus to a homecooked meal.

Love,

Your favourite cousin
